mapper.insert: INSERT INTO id34a_city_time_node(id, name, creater, createdDeptId, owner, ownerDeptId, createdTime, modifier, modifiedTime, workflowInstanceId, sequenceNo, sequenceStatus, ownerDeptQueryCode, time_node, city, province, business_year, start_time, end_time) SELECT MD5(UUID()), name, creater, createdDeptId, owner, ownerDeptId, SYSDATE(), modifier, SYSDATE(), workflowInstanceId, NULL, sequenceStatus, ownerDeptQueryCode, time_node, city, province, #{curBusinessYear}, DATE_ADD(start_time, INTERVAL 1 MONTH), DATE_ADD(end_time, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) FROM id34a_city_time_node WHERE business_year = #{lastBusinessYear}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM i080j_city_time_node_sw_details WHERE city = #{city} AND parentId IN (SELECT id FROM i080j_city_time_node_sw WHERE business_year = #{businessYear}) LIMIT 0,1
